channel.title: 2009 on Nathan R. Yergler
channel.description: Recent content in 2009 on Nathan R. Yergler

item.title: Read: “Invisible”, by Paul Auster
item.description: There are a few authors who I’ll follow just about anywhere; Paul Auster is one of them.

item.title: Read: “Spooner”, by Pete Dexter
item.description: Spooner, Pete Dexter’s latest novel, is not as consistent as The Paperboy , but that does not make it inferior.

item.title: Read: “Fordlandia”, by Greg Grandin
item.description: Fordlandia chronicles the rise and fall of eponymous rubber plantation established by Henry Ford in Brazil in 1927.
